sources.title: The Black Raven (1943) [Mystery]
sources.description:
The Black Raven is a 1943 American film directed by Sam Newfield, produced and released by Producers Distributing Corporation. The movie is about Amos Bradford who is the criminal owner of the Black Raven Inn. During a bad storm a nearby bridge is washed out and a couple of strange characters have to stay overnight at the Black Raven. The result is murder and mystery ...

---

Directed by Sam Newfield, produced by Sigmund Neufeld, written by Fred Myton, starring George Zucco as Amos Bradford aka The Raven, Wanda McKay as Lee Winfield, Robert Livingston as Allen Bentley, Noel Madison as Mike Bardoni, Byron Foulger as Horace Weatherby, Charles B. Middleton as Sheriff, Robert Middlemass as Tim Winfield, Glenn Strange as Andy, I. Stanford Jolley as Whitey Cole and Jimmy Aubrey appears uncredited as Roadblock Watchman.

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe

sources.title: The Black Raven (1943) GEORGE ZUCCOüçï WANDA McKAYüçï MYSTERY THRILLER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: George Zucco, Wanda McKay, Robert Livingston and Glenn Strange
Director: Sam Newfield
Writer: Fred Myton

Murder and treachery unfold at a secluded inn near the Canadian border, where a cast of scheming travelers are forced to take refuge during a wet, stormy night.

Step into a world of intrigue and suspense with The Black Raven (1943), a classic mystery thriller starring George Zucco, Wanda McKay, Robert Livingston, and Glenn Strange. Directed by Sam Newfield, this Poverty Row gem is a masterful example of the "dark house" mystery genre, packed with twists, turns, and chilling atmosphere.

George Zucco delivers a commanding performance as the enigmatic innkeeper, while Wanda McKay shines as the resilient heroine caught in a web of deception. Add Glenn Strange‚Äôs menacing presence, and you‚Äôve got a thriller to keep you guessing until the end.

Perfect for fans of classic mystery movies, suspenseful whodunits, and atmospheric thrillers, this film showcases the best of vintage cinema‚Äôs Poverty Row productions. Watch The Black Raven now on PizzaFLIX, your ultimate destination for timeless treasures from Hollywood‚Äôs golden age.

Subscribe to PizzaFLIX and rediscover the suspense, drama, and charm of classic thrillers like The Black Raven. Don‚Äôt miss this iconic entry in the mystery genre!

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join
